data.name: Pacific Strafe
data.detailed_description:
Pacific Strafe is a Arcade Shoot em up with mission based goals. You fly 1 of 4 different classic World War 2 fighter planes, fighting over the Pacific ocean to liberate islands from the invading force. Protect your carrier from Torpedo planes, lead attacks on enemy battleships and assist your landing craft in taking back territory. Dog fight along side your wingmen, escort bombers on their way to sinking ships.

Pacific Strafe is in early release with a number of elements to be added. The game will continue to evolve over the coming months to a completed stage.
data.about_the_game:
Pacific Strafe is a Arcade Shoot em up with mission based goals. You fly 1 of 4 different classic World War 2 fighter planes, fighting over the Pacific ocean to liberate islands from the invading force. Dog fight along side your wingmen, escort bombers on their way to sinking ships.

Pacific Strafe is in early release with a number of elements to be added. The game will continue to evolve over the coming months to a completed stage.
data.short_description: Fight through historical locations of world war 2 with 1 of 4 classic ww2 fighters. Sink battelships with the help of your wingmen, recapture islands with the help of your tank crews.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 4th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET 5.0 Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET 5.0 Required
